attributes.action: We don't want Theresa May to be our prime minster of England
attributes.background:
We don't want Theresa May to be our prime minister. 
We want new government not Conservative government 
We want change in this country and 
We don't want Theresa May to be conservative leader and uk next prime minister

rejection.details: In any case, as you might already know, the Prime Minister of the UK is not chosen by the UK Government or Parliament, and the leadership of the Conservative party is an internal matter for that party.
